Description: Hand-thrown grenade emits a burst of electromagnetic energy on detonation
Effect/Modifier: Disables non-shielded electronics and cyberware within radius
Special Notes: Disables all unshielded electronic gear/cyberware, including targeting scopes and radios; cyberlimbs disabled for 2d6 rounds; some military tech is shielded. See subsystem for edge cases.

Description: Stationary mine with proximity or remote trigger, emits EMP pulse on activation
Effect/Modifier: Disables vehicles, security systems, unshielded cyberware within blast
Special Notes: Can be set for anti-vehicle/robot ambushes. Mine is often detected with security scan. Edge: may trigger alarms in corporate zones.

Description: Shoulder-fired weapon projects directed EMP pulse
Effect/Modifier: Disables unshielded electronics, cybernetics, and drones along line of fire
Special Notes: Only high-tech security/military have access. Often fails if power cell overused; may trigger electronic alarms unintentionally.

Description: Palm-sized jammer; blocks local wireless signals, emits weak EMP pulse
Effect/Modifier: Blocks radio, comms, basic targeting devices
Vs_Stat/Check: TECH vs. 12 (to bypass jam with wired comm)
Special Notes: Does not damage gear, but can interfere with cyberware comms and guidance. May cause police attention if detected.
